website_summaries.verdict: You get excellent value from this natural almond butter made from 100% almonds and nothing else.
pros: Since there's no added sugar, salt, or oil, it has an intense roasted almond flavor
Certified kosher and suitable for vegans
Extra room in the jar for stirring should natural separation occur
cons: May be slightly bland, but you can sprinkle on some salt to taste

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to order fellow keto-ers!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 jars of this so far & will continue to purchase this product. great value, quality product. It's hard to find an almond butter with the only ingredient being almonds. The price is right & it tastes great. The oil separates but it's not too difficult to mix before use. After the 1st mix subsequent uses don't require as much effort to mix. Perfect for keto friendly recipes and those allergic to peanut butter! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Herring

customer_reviews.title: It's not peanut so you won't die eating it.
customer_reviews.text: Yum. Sticks to the roof of your mouth. Smooth and creamy. Quality is at 80%. Better than the Costco brand, which taste like your ex girlfriends toes. Not as tasty as Mara Natha but nobody can afford that anyways and their product isn't as good as it once was.
customer_reviews.author: radioactivefly

customer_reviews.title: Very good good almond butter
customer_reviews.text: Very good almond butter , you do need to stir it but what some customers don’t realize is that this is a natural product and because it’s not whipped with hydrogenated oil like national brand peanut butter it’s not smooth and creamy like the processed stuff at grocery store, this has a great flavor and is one of the best bargains I’ve seen for almond butter
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: watery
customer_reviews.text: i got two bottles, one was just straight like water so i got a replacement, it was better but the it is still too watery but it have some consistency but i think both bottles were left heat during the summer or it is really old and it dont have almond taste to it
customer_reviews.author: Stevienix

customer_reviews.title: Grainy, oily, does not taste like almonds
customer_reviews.text: First off, this product is very runny despite mixing it several times. It tastes more like oil than actual almonds and the texture is super grainy, NOT smooth as the description claims...I should also mention the containers aren't even filled completely, as you can see in the picture. I am very disappointed as I was hoping to use this as an alternative to peanut butter, but this product is such a rip-off. If anyone is looking for a good almond spread this is NOT the one; you are better off going to an actual grocery store or buying a different brand off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Roth

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps too creamy and runny
customer_reviews.text: Used in berry smoothies. Smells off-putting compared to other Almond butters, which usually smell nice. It's quite runny as well even after stirring in the oil, I would not buy it to spread on a sandwich for example as it will end up in your hands. Perhaps I had an "off" batch, but it's certainly not expired.
customer_reviews.author: aerotheque

customer_reviews.title: My husband eats this every day.
customer_reviews.text: We love this almond butter. Good price, too. No added ingredients like the ones in grocery store. My husband feels so much better since switching from peanut butter. He had swollen glands under arms that were reduced after giving up peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Product oil separates
customer_reviews.text: So I’m giving this an overall 3 stars only because this particular almond butter is the kind that has to be mixed before you use it. The oil separates and goes to the top. I prefer the kind that does not. The taste is good, the valu for the price is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, easy to spread!
customer_reviews.text: Yum yum yum! This almond butter is so taste, I love it. It’s smooth even after being in the fridge it doesn’t harden or make it harder to spread. I give it a nice stir before I refrigerate it and when I take it out it spreads really nice on toast or waffles. My whole family loves almond butter!
customer_reviews.author: Janice King

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other brands
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy an almond butter from Full Belly Farm that was amazing. The taste was really out of this world. But, then my local co-op started charging $30 for it so I had to look for something else. I have bought this one three or four times because it's cheap. It is OK. It depends what you want it for. I use this successfully in my red curry sauce and it adds a nice background flavor. For desserts it somehow doesn't work as well as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: My first experience to Almond Butter!
customer_reviews.text: This is super gooooooood!!! I love it!! I don't really spread it on my bread and just eat it; instead, I use it when I make oat bar or some other dessert. It is just great!! It brings a lot of flavor but not too strong!! I was hesitated to try because I personally don't like peanut butter, which causes me to have the mindset that that all nuts butter are weird hahahahahah. I am so happy I give it a try tho!!
customer_reviews.author: MEITop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Prefer other brands
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad others are enjoying this. I purchased when Maranatha was out of stock. I normally really like 365 brand items, however, I didn't care for the thin consistency of this particular almond butter. Even when I refrigerated it, it never quite congealed and was too thin to spread (for me). I prefer Maranatha or Santa Cruz brands. Everyone likes different things, though. Hope this helps, bon appetit quarantine! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Want a only-almond butter?
customer_reviews.text: If you want a natural, pure, coarsely ground almond butter with nothing else added, this is it! The butter has a rich, creamy taste that does not overpower, or leave a bad taste in your mouth. Tastes great on whole wheat, plain, or sourdough breads. You can also add a spoonful to your favorite cookie or cake recipes, to give that hint of almond flavor! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dalal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Kind of gritty but that’s to be expected with a natural almond butter.
customer_reviews.author: JaNaely

customer_reviews.title: If You Are Looking For A Quality Almond Butter, Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that I disliked about this product. It is necessary to stir this product well before using it but that is just the way that these pure products are. This is a highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: bleach

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with this product unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product several times my last bottle contains a piece of metal about the size of a dime and I bit into it and damage my tooth. I’ll never order this type of Almond butter again looks like a piece of the machine which is used In the processing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened when received
customer_reviews.text: This order was disappointing because when it arrived in a bag by itself, the lid was opened and the seal was broken so there was almond butter and oil all over the inside of the bag. It smelled really good, but scared to eat it since it was opened and too much trouble to send back (too messy). Really bummed because I think it would have been good.
customer_reviews.author: alexril

customer_reviews.title: Almond Syrup?
customer_reviews.text: This is more like almond syrup. It’s ok for smoothies, but is just to runny to stay on toast or a cracker. I like the Justin’s brand but thought I’d try a few of these because it was relatively inexpensive. To be honest, I’d pass on this product if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.text: It arrives as two substances, a very firm(almost hard) almond paste at the bottom of the jar and oil at the top. I got severe cramps in my hand and arm trying to mix the two substances into some semblance of a food like substance.
customer_reviews.author: Ars Gratia Artis

customer_reviews.title: Creamy flavor
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to be able to scoop out the almond butter without having to stir every time. It is nice and creamy with full flavor. I love it on toast with a sprinkle of cinnamon on top!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2OneKS

customer_reviews.title: Oily skin puddle
customer_reviews.text: This is not butter, it is a puddle of almond oil filled with skins. Tastes like dirty skins, does not solidify even in the refrigerator. Stirred forever to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and best price
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is delicious and does not separate in the refrigerator so it is easy to use on a whim. Most inexpensive almond butter I have found and really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: good product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Was a very good almond butter, ate it directly with a spoon. What a treat. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: kevin mangan

customer_reviews.title: It’s evil but delicious 🤤
customer_reviews.text: What does it mean by sheerness, it’s really good, doubt it’s organic, remember all almonds have some humanitarian issue, it’s so hard not to eat it though..
customer_reviews.author: Juan Markos

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite almond butter, it’s pretty runny and doesn’t have a whole lot of flavor. With that said it is delicious with apples to give it a sweeter kick.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Must stir natural oils that cause a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I hated that I had to stir. The flavor is straight up!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, easy to spread
customer_reviews.text: It is harder than you would think to find almond butter that is just made from almonds with no oil added. This fits the bill and it’s creamy and tastes great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!  And without added ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Five stars all around PLUS it contains no other ingredients as many others. Plus, even storing in refrigerator it’s smooth and easy to spread It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Quality almond butter
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and it's good value for the money. Oil separates, but just give it a little mix and it's all good...
customer_reviews.author: Joel S.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this almond butter because I wasn’t crazy about the flavor but will try the vanilla almond butter before I give up on it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit runny but good
customer_reviews.text: Either oily or dry this was too oily but still good
customer_reviews.author: kathy watts

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: It's a little thin. But this is a good thing, no fats to make it thick. I've used up 3 jars so far. Will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor 👌 is not easy to spread but I don't mind I usually use it with my oatmeal. Keeps me full for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and a good price. I love almond butter but it's pretty expensive stuff. I think this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Too hard at the bottom of the jar
customer_reviews.text: Could not stir the very runny top into the bottom. and the bottom was so hard, I ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Too soupy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this since it is runny. I wanted consistency like peanut butter but this doesn’t have it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but almonds!
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond butter because it's just crushed up almonds - no oils or sugar added. And it's really good tasting too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Prestin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible flavor
customer_reviews.text: It did not taste as creamy and fresh like other brands! Too thick and not a good flavor at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: zempman

customer_reviews.title: Too runny to use. NOT usable for sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I hated it, it was like almond flavored oil, not usable for sandwiches, don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good keto almond butter. Great thing about getting it shipped is that it already comes mixed. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Goodall Salvesen

customer_reviews.title: just like 'all-natural peanut butter'
customer_reviews.text: tastes no different.....it's the nutritional value of having nothing but pure almond nut that's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHobbyist

customer_reviews.title: My favorite almond butter!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spread, tastes delish and competitively priced. Love it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dresdale

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff on apples!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the Kirkland brand at Costco. It is comparable in consistency and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I only eat on them better and have for years and this Allman butter has a good flavor it’s smooth and I would definitely recommend it the price is definitely right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yumm
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Healthy. Very runny so I keep it in fridge. But easy to spread
customer_reviews.author: D. Overbye

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: By far the best almond butter I’ve had that doesn’t break the bank! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very oily
customer_reviews.text: There are other almond butter brands that I like better. This is very oily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and I love that it’s not oily. It’s Pre stirred and doesn’t seem to separate like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Deb McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Taste like almond,kind of liquid but easy to spread and the flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: arlene ortiz

customer_reviews.title: hoarding almond butter
customer_reviews.text: It is too damn good. Way better than peanut butter. Delicious, great texture. I love eating it with slices of apple and a little bit of agave drizzled over it. Inside an almond butter and jam sandwich, also very scrumptious. I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mariana franco

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, better price. A little to liquid; but I will continue to buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and smooth. I used it to make almond milk. Faster than using whole almonds and better tasting IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Cocowoozy

customer_reviews.title: A good option that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and a good value! Great consistency once mixed properly (it arrives with oil at the top as is normal).
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Rose

customer_reviews.title: Bland
customer_reviews.text: This was the blandest flavor of nut butter I had ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: tdm

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: separates constantly, the flavor isn't bad, but I won't but this again.
customer_reviews.author: LZuk

customer_reviews.title: Tasty almond butter
customer_reviews.text: Great almond butter, Whole Foods 365 brand. Keeps wells in refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Orangeaud

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Almond Butter
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite out of all the ones I've tried and I've tried so many!
customer_reviews.author: Jenginger

customer_reviews.title: Taste like a real almond so good
customer_reviews.text: Taste so good like a real almond and that’s what I looked for.
customer_reviews.author: Frainy Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: So tastyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to but almond butter on amazon, but I’m glad that I took the chance. This almond butter it’s tasty. There is some separation from the butter and the oil but that’s normal.
customer_reviews.author: joya j

customer_reviews.title: YUK
customer_reviews.text: Taste is not the problem, I don't like the consistency of this product. You have to stir it before you eat it. That wouldn't be a problem if it got thicker. I don't like how runny it is. Literally drips off what you are eating and drops on your clothing. YUK
customer_reviews.author: Susan Long

customer_reviews.title: Great taste without sweeteners added
customer_reviews.text: Great taste without sweeteners added. Some separation, but mixed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shoey

customer_reviews.title: Good value better quality
customer_reviews.text: Price is fairly comparable to box store pricing a little cheaper but I like this better. Easy to spread and has great taste I will be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good almond butter
customer_reviews.text: It was good. A little bit small, but it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Re: Good texture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flavor and texture. I will be purchasing this item again.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Lacks flavor
customer_reviews.text: Did not like runny consistancy needed to be more almond like in its flavor. It was bland.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lilac

customer_reviews.title: so awesome for keto diet
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! No added sugar, so awesome for keto diet, but a tiny bit oily
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah James

customer_reviews.title: Good value.  Good taste.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. The price is the best I have found and the taste is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Reece

customer_reviews.title: Quality food, low price
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years loves her toast! She sometimes could eat this every day all week. Peanut free spread is expensive but 365 brand has made it easier for those of us who want quality food and ingredients without breaking the bank. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this almond butter. It is smooth and creamy and has great flavor. It also has stir room in the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It’s basically pure oil
customer_reviews.text: Thought I’d try this brand but it’s so oily. Usually with most almost butters the oil will float to the top so you can drain but this is a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but hard to fully mix
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price of this almond butter! It was really good, but hard to get all the way to the bottom to mix.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa Goulding

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a decent price for almond butter but this stuff is priced OK
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yummy almond butter, wishing for a nutty version instead of creamy.
customer_reviews.author: SF shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and texture!
customer_reviews.text: I love how smooth this almond butter is and the flavor is so delectable. No added oils either so you feel great about eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Bode

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not enough creaminess or taste for my liking. This nut butter also doesn’t spread as smoothy as others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin P Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, especially when cinnamon is added. Great alternative to peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes amazing. It’s easy to spread, no additives, and is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorean

customer_reviews.title: too much oil
customer_reviews.text: Just too much oil to solids. Stirring and refrigeration did not fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great PB Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a peanut butter addict. I've been converted!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Head

product_meta.title: 365 Everyday Value, Almond Butter, Creamy, 16 oz
product_meta.description: Our standards are what set us apart, and our quality is what keeps us stocking pantries, fridges and freezers with the best natural and organic 365 Everyday Value products every day. We get excited about things like whole grain flours, shade-grown coffee, organic milk and frozen veggies because we know that you care about cooking with the very best ingredients — without compromising on the ingredients you don’t want. (All 365 Everyday Value products meet Whole Foods Market quality standards.)
feature_bullets: Brought to you by Whole Foods Market.  The packaging for this product has a fresh new look. During this transition, you may get the original packaging or the new packaging in your order, but the product and quality is staying exactly the same. Enjoy!
Extra room to stir! Oil separation occurs naturally in this product. Stir before using. To slow down oil separation, refrigerate after opening.
